Take Out Min Delivery: 10.00 User Reviews
Rice Wok Posted by Rolf on 07/04/2012
Studio Citys Best Chinese
If you want a bang for your buck try thisRestaurant. Yuo won't be disappointed. Rice Wok Posted by Anonymous on 07/04/2012
Great food yet inexpensive.
You get a lot of delicious food for a reasonable price. Rice Wok Posted by Bill on 04/20/2011
Solid Valley takeout
For what it is, it's about as good as it gets around here. It's not overly"Americanized"like many takeout restaurants in the area and provides much better value than places like chin chin or pf chang's. If you're craving authentic Chinese food, make the trip to the SG Valley. If you want solid, super fast takeout from a very friendly staff, Rice Wok is for you. Rice Wok Posted by Carolyn on 06/16/2009
Great food
I can't complain- a co-worker and I got the black pepper chicken and brocolli chicken - fresh, spiced well, vegetables not overcooked, all in all good cheap great quality food... the driver asked for his tip... I'd forgotten - can't be mad at that. they deliver quickly as well. Rice Wok Posted by Mike[_]One2Many on 09/13/2008
Good food, great value
This is the first really good"strip-mall-chinese"food I have found in LA. The food is very good (tender, fresh and spiced well). The prices are excellent and the service is always friendly.
1
